amendment.description: To require a quarterly report on audits conducted by the Defense Contract Audit Agency fo task or delivery order contracts and other contracts related to security and reconstruction activities in Iraq and Afghanistan and to address irregularities identified in such reports.

action.text: Amendment SA 463 proposed by Senator Byrd.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 463 that the amendment is non-germane.
Amendment SA 463 ruled non-germane by the chair.
